messages.title: Protecting our young people with a legal, regulated market for cannabis

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Fighting for Labour-run Southwark Council to sell empty and persistently letting affordable housing. Also committed to fight the sell off and demolition of council homes like Wooddene on the Acorn Estate.

Michael spent five years in business supporting and financially investing in talented individuals as they gained the necessary skills and qualification to study nursing but not in nursing while yet instead from an academic background.

issues.economy: Protecting our young people with a legal, regulated market for cannabis

images.caption: MICHAEL BUKOLA for Camberwell & Peckham MP
